snippet: One of the most important changes requires airlines to provide better training on how to prevent and recover from an aerodynamic stall, in which a plane slows to the point that it loses lift.
abstract: Federal Aviation Administration issues significantly tougher training requirements for pilots.
lead_paragraph: One of the most important changes requires airlines to provide better training on how to prevent and recover from an aerodynamic stall, in which a plane slows to the point that it loses lift.
